result.name: isles-of-scilly-marine-conservation-zone-mcz-survey-data
result.notes:
Three surveys of Isles of Scilly rMCZ site have been completed to date (Apr 
2015):

Cruises : Cefas_cend2514 & Cefas_cend0115

Date: 15/11/2014-19/12/2014 & 03/01/2015-23/01/2015

Data collected:

MB Bathymetry Coverage (Contractor): Data collection planned for Nov/Dec 
Endeavour survey

MB Backscatter Coverage (Contractor): Data collection planned for Nov/Dec 
Endeavour survey

SS Coverage: Sidescan available from SAC & Endeavour/IFCA surveys - mixed 
quality

Video and Stills Samples to date: 73 video tows; 868 stills (Cefas_cend2514 & 
Cefas_cend0115) - to be processed by 31/3/15

PSA Samples to date: 29

Infauna Samples to date: 29

Cruises : Cefas_cend0613

Date: 08/05/2013 - 28/05/2013

Data collected:

MB Bathymetry Coverage (Contractor): Data collected

MB Backscatter Coverage (Contractor): Data collected

SS Coverage: Unknown

Video and Stills Samples to date: Unknown

PSA Samples to date: Unknown

Infauna Samples to date: Unknown

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.
